title: Nick Wright on his Chiefs losing, Tom Brady's retirement
description:
Bomani Jones ribs Nick Wright of FS1 about his hometown Chiefs, after their loss to the Bengals over the weekend in the AFC Championship (1:28). Plus, Rams coach Sean McVay tops 49ers coach Kyle Shanahan in the battle of the “bad” decision-makers in the NFC Championship (25:48), and the guys share what they will remember about QB Tom Brady after his announcement that he will retire from the NFL (31:03).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
